name: Engine Serpentine Belt Tensioner Idler Pulley Drive Kit Compatible with Jeep Wrangler 3.8L V6, 2007-2011#Replace 38018 39269 6PK2285 with One Year Quality Assurance
short_description: 【COMPATIBILITY】The engine drive belt tensioner idler pulley serpentine belt kit is compatible with Jeep Wrangler JK 3.8L V6, 2007 2008 2009 2010 2011.

【HIGH QUALITY】The serpentine belt drive component kit is made of high-quality materials, has good wear resistance, corrosion resistance, vibration resistance and high temperature resistance, is not easy to break and more durable.

【FUNCTION】The serpentine belt can transmit power to the engine accessories, and the tensioner can provide the necessary belt tension for the system, control vibration, reduce noise and extend the belt life. The idler pulley can help improve drivetrain stability. If a car does not have a good tensioner, idler pulley and belt kit, then no matter how powerful the engine or the fast tires it is, it will be useless.
【ONE YEAR QUALITY ASSURANCE】If the product has any quality problems within one year, please contact us.
